name: Profession Detective
overview: A French language text adventure with graphics. Stuart, is one of those detectives who will have to survive with only two hundred and two francs in his pocket for the month; a real misery! And yet, one day for him everything will change. On his desk is a message telling him to come to Mr. Pez as soon as possible. So Stuart put on his coat and went to rue d'Hore, number 24. And that's where it all begins; the son of the Pez was kidnapped last night ...
